Centre floods, droughts, storms and other natural disaster aid to farmers hit by crop insurance scheme for historical PM. It will act as safety net for farmers. The first crop insurance scheme which was just 23 per cent from 15 per cent premium to the farmers was insured. Now the new crop insurance scheme after the Kharif and Rabi crops to only 2 per cent premium to the premium would be one and a half percent. 4-4 per cent of the sum assured in a million central and state governments and farmers will pay a 2 percent premium. Prime crop insurance scheme in each gram panchayat in the district level to inform the farming seminar organized by the Department of Agriculture has been scheduled. The successful implementation of these nodal Sgoshtio rural agricultural extension officer must possess. The seminars panchayat secretary, Patwari, employment support and the presence of other employees posted in rural areas is essential. Farmers seminars from March 1 till April 15 will be held at the village panchayat headquarters.

Varieties
 Co 1, MDU 1, COBgoH 1 (Hybrid), Arka Harit, Priya and Preethi are mainly cultivated
